text: Gzhel () is the name of several rural localities in Russia: *Gzhel (selo), Moscow Oblast, a selo in Gzhelskoye Rural Settlement of Ramensky District in Moscow Oblast; *Gzhel (settlement), Moscow Oblast, a settlement in Gzhelskoye Rural Settlement of Ramensky District in Moscow Oblast; *Gzhel, Smolensk Oblast, a village in Bogdanovshchinskoye Rural Settlement of Safonovsky District in Smolensk Oblast
title: Gzhel (rural locality)
